name: Xianliang Chen
story: Yun Tang was born and raised in a small village in rural China. His family was poor, but they instilled in him the values of hard work and dedication. Yun excelled in school and was able to attend university, where he studied engineering. However, he found that he was more interested in the military and enlisted after graduation. Yun quickly rose through the ranks and is respected by his peers for his marksmanship skills and leadership abilities. Despite his success, Yun remains humble and always puts the needs of his team before his own.
